original_text: Now when Jacob saw that there was corn in Egypt, Jacob said unto his sons, Why do ye look one upon another?
korean_text: 그 때에 야곱이 애굽에 곡식이 있음을 보고 아들들에게 이르되 너희는 어찌하여 서로 바라보고만 있느냐

sentences.original_text: that there was corn in Egypt
Why do ye look one upon another?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 어찌하여 서로 얼굴을 쳐다보고 있느냐?
